item.title: Second National Guard member shot in D.C. is "fighting for his life," Trump says
item.description: President Trump told reporters Thursday evening that 20-year-old Army Spc. Sarah Beckstrom died from her injuries in the Washington, D.C., shooting.

item.title: One of 2 National Guard members shot in D.C. has died, Trump says

item.title: One of the National Guard troops shot in D.C. attack has died, Trump says
item.description: President Trump told reporters Thursday night that Army Spc. Sarah Beckstrom has died. Beckstrom was one of the National Guard troops shot in Wednesda...

item.title: Death toll in Hong Kong high-rise fire rises to 94 as 3 people are arrested
item.description: A deadly blaze ripped through bamboo scaffolding on a multi-tower housing estate in Hong Kong, killing dozens of people and leaving hundreds more miss...

item.title: Trump administration orders green card "reexamination" from "countries of concern"
item.description: The review comes after an Afghan national who arrived in the U.S. in 2021 was arrested in the shooting of two National Guard members.
